title: Portable Haegemonia (Hegemonia) - Legions of Iron [USBGaming.org
description:
In my quest to share with the world my obsession for portable games, I&#039;ve decided to campaign in its name and lead the way into the flash memory and rotary disks of every removable storage device that ever was or will be.

Join me.

USBGaming.org

-------Game Info Below--------------

This game is also known in America as "Hegemonia" due to the English/American language differences (H(a)egemony is a real word, by the way.)

This version of Hegemonia (Haegemonia) is updated to the last patch (1.09), and includes the Xmas add-on map. It is Cracked, Serial&#039;d, and ready to play!

KEEP SEEDING!!!

If you have an existing copy of Hegemonia that you want to make portable, this is also possible. Simply take the "Haegemonia - Legions of Iron Portable.exe" and copy it somewhere; then execute it. You will be asked to import the folder of your existing Haegemonia installation. Before running the game, make sure to include the .reg file either from this torrent (it&#039;s in the data folder) or have one already available to put in the data or root folder of the game. It&#039;s easier to take the one I have, and edit the information to match your previous configuration, even using your old serial if you&#039;d like.
The above makes more sense if you go to the site and download the launcher by itself.

Please visit USBGaming.org!!

For more information on this game, please visit its information page on my site.
